titleStmt.title: Bateman's tragedy; or, the perjur'd bride justly rewarded Being the history of the unfortunate love of German's wife and young Bateman.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by and for C. Brown, and T. Norris, and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Wing B1098A cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM edition) which reports date of publication as post 1700.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
